triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper applies reinforcement learning methods to multi-objective decision-making problems.

triples.name: Multi-objective optimization
triples.relevance: The paper proposes methods and frameworks for handling multiple conflicting objectives in decision-making systems.

triples.name: Sequential decision making
triples.relevance: The paper addresses sequential decision-making tasks in real-world applications.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: The paper applies decision-theoretic planning methods to multi-objective problems.

triples.name: Decision theory
triples.relevance: The paper uses decision theory as a foundational framework for modeling multi-objective sequential decision-making.
